product_name: adidas Ed Cargo Shorts - Men's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: With soft fabric and a relaxed fit, the adidas Ed Cargo Shorts make it easy to enjoy a leisurely morning at home or an afternoon around the grill with friends. Cotton/polyester fabric blend is naturally soft and breathable. Traditional 5-pocket style plus cargo pockets provides plenty of storage space. Drawcords at bottom hems let you adjust the fit. Overstock.
short_description: With soft fabric and a relaxed fit, the adidas Ed Cargo Shorts make it easy to enjoy a leisurely morning at home or an afternoon around the grill with friends.
